rows.label: tev013901_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev013901_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Roscoe about the Curators division.

rows.label: tev013901_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev013901_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Roscoe if anything is troubling him.

rows.label: tev013901_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Roscoe about the Curators division.

rows.label: tev013901_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Roscoe about collectibles.

rows.label: tev013901_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Roscoe about recent developments.

rows.label: tev013901_MSG0001
rows.name:
Even merely maintaining our current front lines requires
ludicrous amounts of money and materials.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013901_MSG0002
rows.name:
It was difficult enough on Earth, but supporting a
military on a planet like this requires resources on
a whole other scale.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013901_MSG0003
rows.name:
Which means we Curators need to secure sufficient
resources here on Mira to fuel BLADE's military
activities.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013901_MSG0004
rows.name:
Otherwise, it will be impossible to sustain offensives
against our new enemies, search for the Lifehold,
or continue countless other BLADE projects.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013901_MSG0005
rows.name:
It's not the most glamorous line of work. But when I
came to understand how important it was to the
continuance of BLADE, I knew I had to join up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013901_MSG0008
rows.name:
Our resource-transport helicopters are constantly being
attacked by indigens.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013901_MSG0009
rows.name:
So far, Howard and Ciska have managed to evade the
attacks with quick thinking and spry reflexes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013901_MSG0010
rows.name:
But I know it's only a matter of time before our luck
runs out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013901_MSG0011
rows.name:
We've asked the Interceptors to help clear our flight
paths of indigens.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013901_MSG0012
rows.name:
But they have a lot on their plates right now,
so it could be a bit. I hope they get to it soon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013901_MSG0020
rows.name:
One of our duties as Curators is creating a database
of all the items that can be harvested from Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013901_MSG0021
rows.name:
You should have access to the same database on your
own comm device. It's the one marked "Collectopedia."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013901_MSG0022
rows.name:
If you register enough data about the flora and
fauna that you happen to gather, you'll receive
special rewards.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013901_MSG0023
rows.name:
You can also find missions to collect materials at
Mission Control.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013901_MSG0024
rows.name:
Sometimes you'll have to face tough choices between
handing materials over to clients for rewards, or else
keeping them for your Collectopedia. So, er, good luck![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013901_MSG0030
rows.name:
We refer to the collectibles that we can't categorize
as "curios."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013901_MSG0031
rows.name:
The first BLADE who discovers one of these items is
officially allowed to name it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013901_MSG0032
rows.name: It must feel like discovering a new star or something![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013901_MSG1013
rows.name:
I reported to Commander Vandham about that accident
we had recently, but he already knew about your
involvement.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013901_MSG1014
rows.name:
When I told him that all of the personnel and cargo
were safe, he seemed happy about the outcome.
I guess I'm happy too, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013901_MSG1015
rows.name:
Well, at least this experience should lead Howard and
Ciska to grow up a little.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013901_MSG1016
rows.name:
It sure as hell better! They're still arguing about whose
fault the damn accident was.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013901_MSG2017
rows.name:
We lost a precious helicopter full of valuable cargo,
and then we lost Howard as well. What a tragedy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013901_MSG2018
rows.name:
Oh, but don't feel that you're responsible.
After all, Ciska is still alive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013901_MSG2019
rows.name:
I'm sure she feels terrible about how much she and
Howard used to fight.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013901_MSG2020
rows.name:
And I know she's training hard in new flight techniques
so she'll be able to evade more skillfully the next time
she encounters a flying indigen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013901_MSG2021
rows.name:
I suppose we'll all have to grow strong and overcome
our grief if we hope to survive on Mira.[ST:wait ]
